name: Berberus (Prototype)
description:
Game based off of a joke the other day. Survive the waves of bullets, casual difficulty by bullet hell standards.

Objectives: Try to survive the waves of bullets. Only the heart can be damaged.

Controls: I couldn't get the mouse/touch screen working the same as the other inputs, so I made the speed unbounded. In other words, you can move ridiculously fast with mouse/touch screen, making the game easier.

  • Keyboard: WASD, or Arrow Keys
  • Controller: D-Pad, or Left Analog Stick
  • Mouse: Click and hold anywhere on the screen to move
  • Touch Screen: Tap and hold anywhere on the screen to move

Known Bugs: 

  • Intro Screen: Since the mouse/touch controls have unlimited speed, you can go fast enough to clip through things. If you're out of bounds, just leave the screen boundaries and it will teleport you back in.
